/>
X.ii.6.F.4.d
.
Payment of Funds in a PFOP Account as Accrued Benefits Upon the Death of a Veteran
For information on the payment of funds in a PFOP account as accrued benefits upon the death of a Veteran, see
M21-1, Part XI, Subpart ii, 3.E.6-9
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F - Awards Specific to Institutionalized, Incompetent Veterans
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section F
